title: Double-Breasted High Waist Shorts
description:
Become the perfect price with these Doube-Breasted High Waist Shorts by Momo Plus! These shorts are made of a suit material and have a back middle zipper. They feature four decorative buttons on the front and a great for Ouji-style!

title: Embroidered Mushroom Shorts
description:
Please use the size chart to determine the best size shorts for your body, don't trust your normal size! If any of your measurement is on the borderline between two sizes, it is suggested to size up. In the larger sizes (XL and above), the shorts tend to run smaller than standard US sizes. The size you most often wear may not align with the sizing of these shorts, so it is suggested to measure your body to find the best fit.

Life doesn’t always grant us the opportunity to joyfully frolic through the forest and forage for mushrooms, no matter how much we’d like to. 

But sometimes, life does show us ways we can remember to stay grounded- no matter how busy the day is.

So make sure to add these specially embroidered cottagecore shorts to your closet so you can: 

    • Embrace your inner fairy in olive green without even needing to be outside
    • Stay cute and comfortable in the loose-fitting high waisted shorts
    • Wear simply the stretchy waistband or finish the look with a belt
    • Show off some cute lil’ mushrooms that won’t fade or peel
    • Be comforted knowing these polyester shorts won’t shrink after washing

Orders will include slim black belt to go with the shorts!

Both Laci (white shirt) and Sarah (black shirt) are wearing a size large!

95% Polyester / 5% Spandex

This item is made by Sugar Lich in the USA. It ships from our US warehouse.

title: High-Waisted Suit Shorts

title: MVP Shorts
description:
You can never go wrong with shorts that fit just right whatever you're doing. And if the going gets hard, the vibrant prints will give you that little energy boost you've been waiting for.

• 82% polyester/18% spandex
• Material has a four-way stretch, so fabric stretches and recovers on the cross and lengthwise grains
• Made with a smooth and comfortable microfiber yarn
• Overlock and coverstitch
• Comfortable elastic waistband

Most of these items take 7-12 days to ship due to production time. These products are designed by me and either drop shipped from the manufacturer or sent directly from my home. 

 

Size guide

  XS S M L XL 2XL 3XL
Waist (inches) 25 ¼ 26 ¾ 28 ⅜ 31 ½ 34 ⅝ 37 ¾ 41
Hips (inches) 35 ⅜ 37 38 ⅝ 41 ¾ 44 ⅞ 48 51 ⅛
  XS S M L XL 2XL 3XL
Waist (cm) 64 68 72 80 88 96 104
Hips (cm) 90 94 98 106 114 122 130

title: Asymmetrical High-Waisted Shorts
description:
Turn some heads with these Asymmetrical High-Waisted Shorts by Momo Plus! Perfect Ouji-style coordinates, these shorts feature an irregular waistline. There are two non-functional silver buttons and clasps. A middle-back zipper makes these shorts easy to get in and out of!

title: MVP Joggers
description:
They're soft on the outside, and even softer on the inside, so use them for a jog, or simply for lounging on the couch to binge your favorite show.

• 70% polyester, 27% cotton, 3% elastane
• Fabric weight: 8.85 oz/yd² (300 g/m²)
• Slim fit
• Soft cotton-feel fabric face
• Brushed fleece fabric inside
• Cuffed legs
• Practical pockets
• Elastic waistband with a white drawstring

Most of these items take 7-12 days to ship due to production time. These products are designed by me and either drop shipped from the manufacturer or sent directly from my home. 

 

Size guide

  XS S M L XL 2XL 3XL
Waist (inches) 29 ⅞ 31 ½ 33 ⅛ 36 ¼ 39 ⅜ 42 ½ 45 ⅝
Hips (inches) 37 38 ⅝ 40 ⅛ 43 ¼ 46 ½ 49 ⅝ 52 ¾
  XS S M L XL 2XL 3XL
Waist (cm) 76 80 84 92 100 108 116
Hips (cm) 94 98 102 110 118 126 134
